<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <soap:Body>
    <ODAResponse xmlns="http://schemas.ie.com/oda/v1/soap">
      <ODAResult>
        <iExml xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="">
          <Rs>
            <Header>
              <TransType>DebitCardPayment</TransType>
              <TransactionId>-1</TransactionId>
              <SignonDetails>
                <CustomerId>
                  <CustLoginId>TSCUFD07</CustLoginId>
                </CustomerId>
                <CustomerPswd>
                  <Pswd>RDM42SEP</Pswd>
                </CustomerPswd>
              </SignonDetails>
            </Header>
            <Rq>
              <Header>
                <TransType>DebitCardPayment</TransType>
                <TransactionId>-1</TransactionId>
                <SignonDetails>
                  <CustomerId>
                    <CustLoginId>TSCUFD07</CustLoginId>
                  </CustomerId>
                  <CustomerPswd>
                    <Pswd>RDM42SEP</Pswd>
                  </CustomerPswd>
                </SignonDetails>
              </Header>
              <RqBody>
                <User>
                  <UserId>TSCUFD07</UserId>
                </User>
                <DebitCardPaymentRq>
                  <Product>Credit Card Collections</Product>
                  <Issuer>NewDay</Issuer>
                  <CardNumberPaid>6000083578859285</CardNumberPaid>
                  <Department>NewDay ODA</Department>
                  <Source_of_Payment>Internet</Source_of_Payment>
                  <PaymentDetails>
                    <Amount>29.87</Amount>
                    <CurrencyCode>GBP</CurrencyCode>
                    <BlockedPrefixOverride>True</BlockedPrefixOverride>
                    <CardHolderDetails>
                      <CardHolderAddress1>4 ELMTREE DRIVE</CardHolderAddress1>
                      <CardHolderRegion />
                      <CardHolderCity>CARMARNSHIRE</CardHolderCity>
                      <CardHolderPostCode>SA15 1GT</CardHolderPostCode>
                      <CardHolderCountry>UNITED KINGDOM</CardHolderCountry>
                      <CardHolderFirstName>IRENE</CardHolderFirstName>
                      <CardHolderLastName>BRENNAN</CardHolderLastName>
                    </CardHolderDetails>
                    <CardDetails>
                      <CardNumberDebited>5200000000000114</CardNumberDebited>
                      <CardCSCCode>XXX</CardCSCCode>
                      <CardExpiryDate>03/22</CardExpiryDate>
                    </CardDetails>
                  </PaymentDetails>
                </DebitCardPaymentRq>
              </RqBody>
            </Rq>
            <RsBody>
              <DebitCardPaymentRs>
                <Result>
                  <ResultDecision>Failed</ResultDecision>
                  <ResultCode>ODA_0416</ResultCode>
                  <ResultText>D016_Maximum daily limit reached</ResultText>
                </Result>
              </DebitCardPaymentRs>
            </RsBody>
          </Rs>
        </iExml>
      </ODAResult>
    </ODAResponse>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
